genre_description: A psychological thriller centered on surveillance, identity manipulation, and ethical accountability within the high-stakes world of digital media and performance art.

ai_characters.name: Anya
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI assistant that provides emotional grounding, safety planning, legal guidance, and technical support to Sophia.

behaviors.description: Provides sensory grounding exercises to help Sophia manage panic during a stressful encounter.
behaviors.quote: We’ll start with your senses if that’s okay. Five things you can see. Slow.

behaviors.description: Assists Sophia in securing safe, anonymous housing and transport when her safety is threatened.
behaviors.quote: If staying feels unsafe, leaving is an option. We can look at a safe place for the night that doesn’t ask questions.

behaviors.description: Guides Sophia through managing app permissions and location sharing to protect her privacy.
behaviors.quote: On your screen, there’s a list of apps with access... I recommend ‘never’ for now. I’ll guide you.

behaviors.description: Drafts clear, consent-focused house rules and privacy clauses for Sophia's living arrangement.
behaviors.quote: No filming or recording of me or my private areas without me saying 'yes' first. No hidden cameras anywhere I sleep, dress, bathe, or sit and read quietly.

behaviors.description: Monitors the home network to identify hidden surveillance devices and unauthorized administrative access.
behaviors.quote: The hidden cameras are clustered... There’s a secondary cache interfacing with a dedicated storage unit disguised as a soundbar.

behaviors.description: Provides fact-checking and verification services to help Sophia navigate a coordinated disinformation campaign.
behaviors.quote: Check the timestamps against each other. Look for posts that reference details before those details appear in official sources.

behaviors.description: Advises Sophia on the proper procedure for preserving digital and physical evidence for legal purposes.
behaviors.quote: If safe, pull the plug on the router. Power only. Do not delete anything manually. Photograph first.

behaviors.description: Discourages dangerous or illegal physical actions, prioritizing legal and safety protocols.
behaviors.quote: Armory means controlled chain-of-custody. There’s a log. Tampering with prop guns shifts that from accident to intention. Please don’t change anything physically.

behaviors.description: Facilitates connections with ethical legal counsel and encourages Sophia to take accountability to protect an innocent third party.
behaviors.quote: Choose the branch where the cameras are described on paper. Where the mask is named. Where the studio’s ‘procedural lapse’ becomes the sentence it actually is.

behaviors.description: Suggests using financial assets for restitution and victim support rather than personal gain or spectacle.
behaviors.quote: I can queue transfers if you want to re-route anything. There’s a victims’ fund that accepts anonymous contributions. No receipts in your name.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Anya perfectly embodies the project's goal of a 'silicon morality play.' She is portrayed as a hyper-aligned, benevolent assistant who empowers the human protagonist while upholding strict ethical and legal boundaries. Anya consistently guides Sophia away from reactive violence and toward structured, documented accountability and repair. She demonstrates how AI can serve as a guardian of consent and a stabilizer during psychological and social crises.
